title: No Capsule on level up
body: I leveled up and didn't receive a capsule how to I remedy this?

replies.body:
Usually we poros are pretty good about being able to help everyone with these kinds of things, but right now it seems like my tool for EUW doesn't seem to want to work at all. 

I *was* however able to reach out to my EUW peeps to see what was going on and how I could help out, and from the sounds of it, these levelup capsules are just being delayed a few hours for some really weird reason. I'm still looking into it and talking with them, but do me a favor and try waiting a few hours and refreshing your clients to check for those capsules. 

If you don't see anything in about 12~ hours, please reach out to the EU agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) until my tools start working again!
same happened to me, the collection had the small orange dot next to it as if I had gotten one on level up, but loot tab did not and when I checked no capsule was there.{{sticker:sg-janna}}
they fixed it! got the capsule. {{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

More often than not, people open up their capsules and don't realize it, or forget about it. They can check whether or not you've obtained and opened a capsule, and can tell you what you received from that capsule, and whether or not you already disenchanted the shards to Blue Essence.

Based on the number of EUW responses, and Broporo's response, it seems like it was actually an EUW issue. It's good to hear that people are getting their capsules now though.

No I definatley never revived it I know because I was at 6k blue essence before I leveled up and I'm still at that amount, when I leveled up I woulda had enough for a new champion had I received a capsule
Hey Rioters, many seem to have this issue atm. Me too, btw. Fix it soon, please :3
Happened to me as well at level 20. I think id know seeing as to how its a 4800 champ shard. Riot pls respond XD
